sourcesContent:
import { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Dialog, Menu, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { Link, useHistory, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { database } from '../firebase' import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext' import Launch from '../images/launch.png' import EvCirc from '../images/evcirc.png' import { ChartBarIcon, DocumentTextIcon, HomeIcon, MenuAlt1Icon, XIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/outline' import { ChevronDownIcon, ChevronRightIcon, SearchIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/solid' const navigation = [ { name: 'Dashboard', href: '', icon: ChartBarIcon, current: true }, ] const secondaryNavigation = [ { name: 'Home', href: '/admin-courses', icon: HomeIcon }, ] const statusStyles = { 'uploaded': 'bg-green-100 text-green-800', 'not Uploaded': 'bg-red-100 text-red-800', } const monthNames = ["January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December" ]; function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function Dashboard() { const { course } = useParams() const [name, setName] = useState('') const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false) const { signout, currentUser } = useAuth() const history = useHistory() let courseName = null let userData = null if (course === 'physics') { courseName = 'Physics Mechanics' userData = database.physics_users.doc('ananthkashyap4@gmail.com') } else if (course === 'math') { courseName = 'Math Competitions 1' userData = database.math_users.doc('ananthkashyap4@gmail.com') } else if (course === 'biology') { courseName = 'Biology' userData = database.biology_users.doc('ananthkashyap4@gmail.com') } else if (course === 'astronomy') { courseName = 'Astronomy' userData = database.astronomy_users.doc('ananthkashyap4@gmail.com') } useEffect(() => { document.title = 'Admin - ' + courseName }) function GetAssignments() { const [assignments, setAssignments] = useState([]) const [assignmentCount, setAssignmentCount] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { userData.collection('assignments').orderBy('assigned', 'asc').get() .then((querySnapshot) => { let arr = [] let count = 0 querySnapshot.forEach((doc) => { arr.push({ id: doc.id, status: doc.data().disabled ? 'not Uploaded' : 'uploaded', name: doc.data().name, date: monthNames[doc.data().assigned.toDate().getMonth()] + ' ' + doc.data().assigned.toDate().getDate() + ', ' + doc.data().assigned.toDate().getFullYear(), datetime: doc.data().assigned, }) count = count + 1 }) setAssignments(arr) setAssignmentCount(count) }) }, []) return { assignments, assignmentCount } } function getUserName() { database.users.doc(currentUser.email).get() .then((doc) => { setName(doc.data().first_name + ' ' + doc.data().last_name) }) return name } async function handleLogout(event) { event.preventDefault() try { await signout() history.push("/landing") } catch { } } return (
{navigation.map((item) => ( (item.name === 'Dashboard' || item.name === 'Discussion') ? {item.name} : {item.name} ))}
{secondaryNavigation.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
